name: THE ILL AND THE DEAD
description:
I started this project by learning how to write different kinds of code in C# for Unity, and quickly created a rough prototype of what I wanted this to become. My goal is to shape the project with the feedback I will receive from the community. To create a wholesome and fun experience for everyone.

STORY: You are a paranormal investigator who has been contacted by an unknown person claiming to be a member of a wealthy family, who has inherited a house. As you explore the house, strange things begin to happen, and you can't shake the feeling that you're being watched.

Soon after, you discover an old journal belonging to the previous owner of the house. It tells the story of a plague doctor who once lived here and was rumored to have cursed the house before he died.

Now, you must find a way to break the curse before it's too late. As the days go by, you realize that the curse is more powerful than you ever imagined. You're not just fighting against a haunted house, but against the very forces of darkness themselves.

Will you be able to break the curse and save the man with memory loss, or will you succumb to the terror that lurks within the old house? The choice is yours."
